Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: vole
A small vole with grey brown fur, creamy grey underparts, a rounded muzzle, beady black eyes, small furry ears and a short tail.
A small vole with grey brown fur, creamy grey underparts and a short tail.
back
The back of a vole covered with thick grey brown fur.
The grey brown furred back of a vole.
belly
The quivering belly of a vole covered in creamy grey fur.
The belly of a vole covered in greyish fur.
cheek
The grey brown fur covered cheek of a vole.
The grey brown fur covered cheek of a vole.
chest
The {breast|chest} of a vole, covered in soft creamy grey fur.
The chest of a vole, covered in greyish fur.
ear
The small fur covered ear of a vole; light pink skinned on the inside and covered in grey brown fur on the back. The ear twitches alertly, detecting the slightest sound.
A small grey brown furred vole ear.
eye
The {bright|small}, beady black eye of a vole.
The black eye of a vole.
pair of eyes
A pair of beady black vole eyes.
A pair of black vole eyes.
paw
The tiny pink-skinned paw of a vole, with claws that enable it to easily grasp grass stalks and other plants.
The tiny, sharply clawed paw of a vole.
head
The grey brown fur covered head of a vole, with small, furry ears, beady black eyes, a rounded muzzle, twitching whiskers, and a mouth with teeth suitable for gnawing plants.
The grey brown fur covered head of a vole, with small ears, black eyes, whiskers, and rounded muzzle.
vole breast
By observing the vole's breast carefully you detect a rapidly beating heart.
The greyish, furry breast of a vole.
leg
The nimble leg of a vole covered with grey brown fur on the outer side and creamy grey fur on the inner side.
The leg of a vole covered with grey brown fur on the outer side and greyish fur on the inner side.
muzzle
The grey brown furred muzzle of a vole, with a blunt nose, luxuriant whiskers, creamy grey furred chin and a mouth equipped with teeth suitable for gnawing plants.
The grey brown furred muzzle of a vole, with a blunt nose, whiskers and mouth.
neck
The short neck of a vole covered in grey brown fur.
The short furry neck of a vole.
side
The sides of a vole, covered with grey brown fur.
The furry sides of a vole.
tail
The short, brownish tail of a vole.
The short, brownish tail of a vole.
teeth
The yellowish teeth of a vole; long front incisors help it harvest plants.
The small teeth of a vole.

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: Microtus agrestis - This is the short-tailed vole, a mammal commonly found in grassy areas. This object spawns and is set as 'prey'
